name: League of Light: The Gatherer - Collector's Edition
storyline: After saving the Hunter and his son from a nefarious witch, you never thought you'd be back in Blake’s Mountain. Now the Hunter needs the League's help again – someone has been following him, and he fears for his family. But when you arrive to investigate... you're arrested for trespassing! Someone in town is impersonating a League of Light agent, using the cover to stalk and capture the Hunter.
summary: League of Light: The Gatherer is the fourth title in the League of Light series. Can you and your little scarecrow friend track down the imposter and uncover his devious plans? Find out in this spooky hidden object puzzle adventure game!
